name: THE MYSTERIOUS DISAPPEARANCE OF MORTIMER J.W.
name_original: THE MYSTERIOUS DISAPPEARANCE OF MORTIMER J.W.
description:
On the night of the 2nd of November 1987, Mortimer J.W. had disappeared from his apartment, never to be seen again.

What shook the investigators, that everything he had, has disappeared with him.

Everything, fridge, toilet, shower, his bed.

His body had never been found.
